jd: From: Richa Mathur, Orbitpeople LLC richa.mathur@orbitpeople.com Reply to: richa.mathur@orbitpeople.com Hi Kuldiep,How are you doing?The following are the job details:Job title: ReactJS DeveloperLocation: Plano,TXJob type: HybridJob Requirements:• React Js Experience• 8+ years of Core Java development experience, familiar with Java 8 or higher.• Java Fullstack engineers with UI, and backend skillsets using Java, JavaScript’s, and React Framework• Apache Spark developer with Java/Scala (Building reusable framework and toolsets for DQ, Realtime Streaming and Batch data process and data ingestion)• General support resource with Hadoop and database skills• Able to deliver end to end project.• Experience with java development and aware of java patterns.• Experience in Spring Boot uses for development.• Experience of development project and developed functionalities using java, j2ee.• Must have AWS experience.• AWS services (S3, SQS, SNS,ECS, Lambda, AWS Cloud watch etc.)• Experience on AWS deployed application.• Experience on Oracle or Postgres or DynamoDB to perform SQL.• Agile/scrum development experience.• Good collaboration and communication skills.• Ready to learn new technologies and perform POC on it.• Ability to diagnose prod issues and defects.Skills required (must be showcased on resume): React JS, Java, Spring boot, Microservices , AWSNice to Have: Kafka, Hadoop, Tiger Graph, Sparkling Water from H2O.Are you interested for this job?
